item.title: Verify your Kubernetes Cluster Network Policies: From Faith to Proof
item.description: Implement a technical check that verifies implemented security measurements. In case of network policy, try to establish a blocked network connection. Keep the checks as simple as possible and propagate the results in existing monitoring solution.
